body_html:
Thanks for your reply! I am using both Tensors and Variables and this RuntimeError has bitten me several times. I wasn't aware that this only happens for cuda Tensor and not cuda Variable.

Could you shed some light on the reason why this constraint has to exist for the cuda Tensor case in the first place?

body:
Thanks for your reply! I am using both Tensors and Variables and this RuntimeError has bitten me several times. I wasn't aware that this only happens for cuda Tensor and not cuda Variable.

Could you shed some light on the reason why this constraint has to exist for the cuda Tensor case in the first place?
